name: Machine Learning
details: I am skilled in Machine Learning and usually focuses on Computer Vision mainly working with CNNs and a bit of Vision Transformers. Skilled in working with Pytorch, OpenCV

name: Software Engineering
details: I am a skilled backend developer (primarily working with Golang and .NET Core) and conversant with frontend development (React.js, .NET Blazor) and mobile application development (Android, React Native, Flutter). Additionally, I am a Blockchain Developer skilled in Hyperledger Fabric.

name: Project Management
details: I am skilled in Project Management, a member of the Project Management Institute, and PMP Certified. Through PMP, I am conversant with the PMBOK, which includes Cost Management, Schedule Management, Stakeholder Management, Risk Management, and Quality Management.

name: Change Enablement and Change Management
details: Being conversant with Project Management and IT Enterprise Governance (COBIT certified), I am familiar with Change Management and Change Enablement when implementing projects.

name: Enterprise Governance
details: Through COBIT, in which I am certified at the Design and Implementation Level, I am familiar with Enterprise Governance, especially in IT. This includes change control and governance skills.

name: Enterprise Architecture
details: Through TOGAF, in which I am certified, I am skilled in Enterprise Architecture. This equips me to help enterprises build IT systems that are structured to align with business strategy and promote responsiveness to change, agility, and resilience.
